pageContext.claim: “Tester joined... Tester joined every other Senate Democrat in supporting open-border legislation from the now-legendary Dianne Feinstein.”
pageContext.analysis: Tester was a co-sponsor of the Keep Families Together Act, which was introduced by Sen. Dianne Feinstein (D-Calif.). The bill is aimed at outlawing the president's family separation policy not creating open borders. With a few exceptions, if passed, it would ban the "Department of Homeland Security, the Department of Justice, or the Department of Health and Human Services from removing a child who is under the age of 18 and has no permanent immigration status from his or her parent or legal guardian at or near the port of entry or within 100 miles of the U.S. border."
